NEWPOST.TITLE: Make a new post
NEWPOST.PLACEHOLDER: Write the text of the publication. Remember that it can only have a maximum of 200 characters.
NEWPOST.DROP_IMAGE: Drag and drop the image here
NEWPOST.MODAL_ERROR_TEXT: The publication must have a text or a photo

INDEX.NO_MORE_POSTS: You have already seen all the posts in your feed today ðŸ™Œ

EDIT.TITLE: Profile details
EDIT.PICTURE_DROP: Drag and drop the profile picture here
EDIT.DESCRIPTION_PLACEHOLDER: Write a description of yourself. Remember that it can only have a maximum of 200 characters.
EDIT.NOTE: Note: If you want to change the login credentials please go to the Settings tab.

LIKED_POSTS.NO_POSTS: You haven't liked any post yet, what are you waiting for?

NOTIFICATIONS.TITLE: Notifications
NOTIFICATIONS.NOTIFICATIONS_DISABLED: Notifications are disabled. Activate them in the Settings tab to view them.
NOTIFICATIONS.NO_NOTIFICATIONS: You have no notifications at the moment
NOTIFICATIONS.NO_NOTIFICATIONS_TO_DELETE_TITLE: You have no notifications to delete
NOTIFICATIONS.NO_NOTIFICATIONS_TO_DELETE_TEXT: Remember that friend requests cannot be deleted, only rejected

SETTINGS.TITLE: Settings
SETTINGS.NOTIFICATIONS_TEXT: Turn notifications on/off (will no longer appear in the Notifications tab)

MESSAGE.DELETE_MODAL_TITLE: Are you sure you want to delete this message?
